Review Text: I had a three day business trip, and arrived late. Super friendly receptionist upgraded me to a suite. Very nice room, nice restaurant, amazing breakfast, and views over the golf course. Good location, also for a family holiday. Definitely coming back again !

Additional Ratings:
Value:3

Location:5
Cleanliness:3
Service:2
Sleep Quality:2
Review Text:
The stay was one big deception.
The staff at the reception was friendly because they were obliged to. 
We just came from another hotel in Dubai where we had a wonderful stay, but because we wanted more of a nice relaxed stay at the pool we choose Vida hotel, which turned into one big disappointment when it was filled with screaming children.
The room given had connecting doors next to a family with small children. After complaining , nearly begging, we got another room. 
There was no relaxing at the pool, music so loud we could not hear each other anymore and nowhere was a place to sit somewhere quiet. No escape!!
Your information on the site does not mention it is not a hotel for every customer. It preaches ‚Äúrelaxation‚Äù for people conducting business, but it is a hotel for big families with children.
The rooms are okay, nothing special compared to other hotels. The bed is extremely hard and uncomfortable.
I would not recommend this hotel to others and will never return. There is enough choice of good hotels in Dubai. This one is certainly not one of them.
